attributes.action: negotiate with the other members of the EU to remove VAT on all safety related equipment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is criminally irresponsible of our collective governments to allow VAT to be charged on ANY safety equipment. It should never have happened in the first place. It is wrong and should be considered as a form of exploitation. We should not be charged tax on something we should have no choice about using. It is immoral and should be taken up with the European Court of Human Rights if necessary.
